name: Compressed (Anton)
description:
Compressed is a small challenge that I've set to myself.

The code fits into 200 lines and it doesn't rely on too many dirty tricks so it is still readable.

Aside from that it is a neat small arcade game with an online leaderboard

source can be found here:

https://github.com/Redoxee/CompressedGame/blob/mas...

I used the Löve2D game engine

Thanks

Anton

Edit 1 :

- Added the option to reset even while playing

- Added a Best Combo counter
